entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support DI Container mutability #91163
  • Incorrect nullable annotation on Validator.TryValidateValue's `value`? #91162
    8.0.0
  • Class serialized to an empty array [] with System.Text.Json #91155
  • [API Proposal]: Provide an `IUnknown` IID constant #91150
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add additional overloads for `Random.Next*` #90998
  • NativeAot reverse engineering capabilities compared to c/c++ #91157
  • GC does not correctly take into account available cache for a VM #81428
    8.0.0
  • DateTime.DaysInMonth minor performance tweaks #91103

PullRequests

Created

  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent (alternative version) #91160
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2253244 #91159
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Re-enable an assert in BigInteger #91158
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix Http2 MultiConnection test race conditions #91156
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91152
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Use reader/writer lock instead of mutex for `ComWrappers` RCW cache #91149
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix recording/replay of getExactClasses #90926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #91151
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2252827 #91144
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Rename EnC related defines #91146
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91071
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91072
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Fix stack_limit handling #91095
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable SuperPMI collection of a libraries tests run #91101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Activate Quic Alpn Narrowing Test #91116
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent #91138
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix Alpine Linux mono build #90251
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Allow for PublishAot and PublishSingleFile at the same time #91141
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
